block.p: Claudia Nastuk Saunders and James Joseph Bourke were married yesterday afternoon at St. Matthew's Episcopal Church in Bedford, N.Y. The Rev. Dr. William E. Foley, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony, in which the Rev. Robert B. O'Connor, a Roman Catholic priest, took part.

Mrs. Bourke, 33, is a vice president and account director at Young & Rubicam Advertising in Manhattan. She graduated magna cum laude from Smith College. She is a daughter of Mrs. John Saunders of Kitchawan, N.Y., and the late Mr. Saunders. Her father was a vice president at the William Esty Company, an advertising agency in Manhattan.

Claudia Nastuk Saunders and James Joseph Bourke were married yesterday afternoon at St. Matthew's Episcopal Church in Bedford, N.Y. The Rev. Dr. William E. Foley, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony, in which the Rev. Robert B. O'Connor, a Roman Catholic priest, took part.

Mrs. Bourke, 33, is a vice president and account director at Young & Rubicam Advertising in Manhattan. She graduated magna cum laude from Smith College. She is a daughter of Mrs. John Saunders of Kitchawan, N.Y., and the late Mr. Saunders. Her father was a vice president at the William Esty Company, an advertising agency in Manhattan.

Mr. Bourke, 35, is a vice president and a broker at Hilb, Rogal & Hamilton Company of New York, insurance brokers. He graduated from the College of Insurance in Manhattan. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Andrew C. Bourke of Somerville, N.J. His father retired as business administrator for the Pequannock Township Public Schools in Pompton Plains, N.J.
